Sequence Information.Target Organism: Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli (MIC=4.07 µg/ml), Propioni bacterium acnes (MIC=12.32 µg/ml), Pseudemonas aeruginosa (MIC=4.07 µg/ml);Gram-positive bacteria:Bacillus cereus (MIC=12.32 µg/ml), Staphylococcus aureus (MIC=4.07 µg/ml), Listeria monocytogene (MIC=4.07 µg/ml).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Function: GLFcin is thermal-stable and with high antibacterial activity.

Literature.Title: Expression of recombinant antibacterial lactoferricin-related peptides from Pichia pastoris expression system.
Literature.Author: Chen GH, Chen WM, Huang GT, Chen YW, Jiang ST.

Literature.Title: Characterization of the goat lactoferrin cDNA. Assignment of the relevant locus to bovine U12 synteny group.
